title: Madame French Restaurant - Modern Bistro + Cocktail Parlor - JC
text: Unwind and indulge at Madame, Jersey City’s premier French dining experience, with our Happy Hour WED – FRI from 5-7 PM / Sundays 4PM – Close, only at the bar. Whether you’re looking to relax after work or start your evening with style, our elevated cocktails, fine wines, and delicious bites set the perfect mood.
